existing_features.title: Apply a cohesive green and earthy visual theme throughout the entire site: primary green (#2E7D32 / #4CAF50 range), earthy brown accents (#795548 / #A1887F range), white backgrounds, rounded cards, modern sans-serif fonts optimized for readability, and agriculture-themed iconography. Enforce this consistently across all sections.

Build a full-page, single-page React application for KrishiSahay with smooth scroll navigation. Include a sticky top navbar with the KrishiSahay logo/name, navigation links to all sections (Home, Features, How It Works, Chat Demo, Schemes, About, Contact), and a language selector dropdown showing English, Hindi, Marathi, Punjabi, Tamil, and Telugu as visual options (no actual translation needed).

Create a hero section with: headline 'Empowering Farmers with AI-Driven Agricultural Guidance', subheading 'Ask questions about crops, pests, fertilizers, and government schemes in your local language.', two CTA buttons ('Ask Your Question' linking to the chat demo section and 'Explore Features' linking to the features section), and a full-width background using the generated Indian farmland hero image.

Build a Features section with 7 cards, each containing an icon, title, and brief description: üåæ Crop Advisory, üêõ Pest & Disease Identification, üå± Fertilizer Recommendations, üíß Irrigation Guidance, üå¶ Weather-based Suggestions, üèõ Government Scheme Information, üì∂ Low-Connectivity Optimized AI. Display as a responsive grid (2‚Äì3 columns on desktop, 1‚Äì2 on mobile).

Build a 'How It Works' section showing a 4-step visual flow with numbered steps and icons: Step 1 ‚Äì Farmer asks a question (text/voice/image); Step 2 ‚Äì AI processes using Generative AI + Agricultural Knowledge Base; Step 3 ‚Äì Smart, simple answer delivered in local language; Step 4 ‚Äì Offline-ready lightweight response mode.

Build a Live AI Chat Demo section with a chat interface UI. Include: a chat window displaying a conversation history, an input field with placeholder 'Type your agricultural question‚Ä¶', and a send button. Implement pre-programmed AI responses for at least 8 common queries covering topics like fertilizer advice for specific crops/soils, pest identification, irrigation schedules, weather-based planting guidance, and government scheme eligibility. Unrecognized queries should receive a helpful default response. Responses should appear after a short simulated delay.

Build a Government Schemes section displaying 3 scheme cards: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi), Soil Health Card Scheme, and Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana. Each card should include the scheme name, a brief description of its benefits, and an eligibility note.

Build a Stats section displaying: '10,000+ Queries Resolved', '5,000+ Farmers Supported', and at least 2 additional relevant stats (e.g., '15+ Crops Covered', '6 Languages Supported'). Display as large, bold numbers with labels in a horizontal band.
Build a Farmer Testimonials section with at least 3 testimonial cards, each containing a farmer's name, village/state, a quote about their experience using KrishiSahay, and an avatar placeholder.

Build an About section describing KrishiSahay as 'A Generative AI‚Äìpowered agricultural query resolution system designed to bridge the knowledge gap between modern agricultural research and farmers.' Highlight 4 key pillars: AI-powered search, Smart summarization, Offline support, Farmer-first design.

Build a Contact/Query form section with fields: Name, Phone, Village/State, and Query Message, plus a Submit button. On submit, validate that all fields are filled and display a success message ('Your query has been submitted! We'll get back to you soon.'). The form is frontend-only ‚Äî no backend submission needed.

Build a footer with: KrishiSahay logo/name, tagline, links to Privacy Policy and Terms (displayed as placeholder pages or modals), social media icons (Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, WhatsApp), and a copyright line. Use a dark green or brown background.
